General.Name: Médica Sur S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Médica Sur, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a healthcare hospital in Mexico. It offers angiology, vascular, and endovascular surgery; bariatric surgery; cancer; cardiology; checkup and preventive medicine; children; dental; emergency; endocrinology; general; geriatric; gynecology and obstetrics; specialized; imaging unit; MRI unit; neonatology; orthopedic and traumatology; urology; transplant; spine microsurgery; robotic; plastic; and outpatient surgeries. The company was incorporated in 1966 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico. Médica Sur, S.A.B. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Neuco, SAPI de CV.
General.Address: Puente de Piedra 150, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 14050
